slides.title: Mastering Next.js
slides.subtitle:
Complete Full-Stack React Framework
From Basics to Production Ready

slides.name: Aravind Govindhasamy
slides.title: Software Developer
slides.oss_experience: Full-Stack Development & Modern Web Framework Specialist

box.content: Full-stack React framework for production-grade applications

note.text: Fun fact: Next.js was created to solve React's SEO and performance limitations for production applications!

list.text: Next.js - Full-stack framework, SSR/SSG out of the box
Create React App - SPA only, client-side rendering

box.code:
# Create new Next.js app with create-next-app
npx create-next-app@latest my-next-app

# Or with specific options
npx create-next-app@latest my-next-app --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app

# Navigate to project
cd my-next-app

# Start development server
npm run dev
# or
yarn dev
# or
pnpm dev

# Project will be available at http://localhost:3000

# Build for production
npm run build

# Start production server
npm start

# Available templates:
# --typescript    # TypeScript setup
# --tailwind      # Tailwind CSS
# --eslint        # ESLint configuration
# --app           # App Router (recommended)
# --src-dir       # src/ directory
# --import-alias  # Custom import aliases

my-next-app/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app/                 # App Router (new)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ layout.tsx       # Root layout
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ page.tsx         # Home page
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ globals.css      # Global styles
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ favicon.ico      # Favicon
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pages/               # Pages Router (legacy)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ api/             # API routes
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ _app.tsx         # App component
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ index.tsx        # Home page
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public/              # Static assets
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ next.svg
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ vercel.svg
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/          # Reusable components
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lib/                 # Utility functions
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ styles/              # CSS modules
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ next.config.js       # Next.js configuration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ tsconfig.json        # TypeScript config

# App Router (recommended) vs Pages Router:
# - App Router: Latest, supports React Server Components
# - Pages Router: Stable, file-based routing
# Choose App Router for new projects
